channel.title: Comments on: Why does sys.dm_exec_requests not show my SPID?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Scott McFadden
item.dc:creator: Scott McFadden
item.description: Great post, was racking my brain trying to figure out why my query wasn't showing up in dm_exec_requests.
item.content:encoded: Great post, was racking my brain trying to figure out why my query wasn’t showing up in dm_exec_requests.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.content:encoded:
Don’t forget about blocking_session_id. The following would have immediately shown you that session 58 was being blocked by session 57.

SELECT *
FROM sys.dm_exec_requests
WHERE blocking_session_id <> 0;
